website_summaries.verdict: One of the best LED desk lamps available for eye care, technology, and adjustability.
pros: LED light is soft and even for supreme eye care
Able to dim with touch control settings
Includes a memory function for customizing light brightness
cons: Lamp head does not adjust from side to side, only up and down

website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice w/superb flexibility, but it lacks features that some cheaper LED lamps offer.
cons: The control button on the top of the lamp is awkwardly placed and very sensitive

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for photography works.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and well built product. Great light with diffusion. As a photographer I needed a close to daylight desk lamp, not heating ; this one is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: FCH

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted for less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this light for less than 6 months. About a month ago, I was unable to continue using it because the light flickers as soon as I turn it on, then the intensity decreases to the lowest possible setting. Once that happens, I can't turn it off using the touch button on the top; I have to use the switch. Check out the video I just captured today, Nov. 28, 2018.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSun

customer_reviews.title: Great at first... started to flicker after a few days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several months ago. When I first received it, quality felt strong and the light was very bright. Loved the purchase. A few weeks into use, the light would sometimes flicker from light to dark settings. It was sporadic, so I didn't worry about it. It has steadily worsened until the light is no longer bright and often flickers. It may be a bad apple, we will see if the manufacturer fixes the situation. UPDATE: Manufacturer sent me a new lamp, unbidden. Just showed up after I wrote this review before I could contact support. Very impressed. Will use the new lamp for a few weeks to ensure quality, then increase my rating again.
customer_reviews.author: JaveStack

customer_reviews.title: Not fully adjustable head and touch response buttons.
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer complained about the head does not swivel side to side only forward and horizontally so it's almost impossible to have it looking level to your desk. The adjustable light is nice but the touch response buttons are flakey and do not respond well all the time and sometimes have to tap it multiple times to get it to respond. Also having to hold the power button down to turn off for several seconds like a phone is annoying when you just want it off. These things could be over looked if it was cheap but this was an expensive lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Do it yourselfer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely light, and well made but I returned it ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely light, and well made but I returned it. Unlike video images on the sales page the head does not pivot in one direction which is key! I could not rotate it along the long axis of the head to tilt the light out of my eyes. It stays flat to the plane of the desk! Very bright light hurts the eyes and this rotation seems obvious but is missing. Paid return shipping and bought the top-end model from their competitor. Cost me but this kind of light has to work fully.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Haines

customer_reviews.title: Great light, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very, very good light. I use mine for working with electronics - building prototyping, soldering ect.. makes a great "bench work light" It is physically infinitely adjustable, and it stays put. The dimming function is so useful and intuitive. But even better is the post-sale customer service; emails are answered within a few hours, polite, friendly. I had a small issue with dimming on the first one I ordered, and they sent me a new replacement at no charge within 48 hours - I even got to keep the old one!
customer_reviews.author: p-rose

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This light is excellent so far. The dimming function is fairly granular, light output is even, and the adjustable arm is stable. My only wish is that it would be nice to specify color temperature. This light appears to be in the 5-6k range.
customer_reviews.author: Todd L Vanderheiden

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality - touch button fails after several times using the lamp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp to light a corner that is rarely used. Since purchasing it, I have turned in on a maximum of 5 times and on the 5th occasion the touch button popped off exposing a spring. I would not recommend this product to anyone that intends to actually use it! It is nice to look at, before the button pops off...
customer_reviews.author: Corey Brew

customer_reviews.title: Great Light!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic desk/task light! Easily adjustable, compact yet it has a long reach. The the style is sleek and it's very nicely made of mostly aluminum. I was going to get the brighter version, but for what I need, (inspecting stones, gems & minerals) it's perfect, and I'm guessing it's colour temperature is somewhere daylight. It's bright enough that if I wanted to light my whole 3'x5' desk, I could, but up close it's a bit bright for me, so the dimmer is great. I also love the memory function which turns the light back on at the same brightness at which it was turned off... In fact, I like it so much, I'm gonna buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Celtenator

customer_reviews.title: Keep your warranty paperwork!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Three days shy of 1 year the lamp has stopped working. It has sat unused for most of that year since I am a project procastinator. I used it about 36 hours in the last 3 days. Now it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: colorado

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Cool White light
customer_reviews.text: So many great compliments about this light that I agree with, so I will spare you a long diatribe. My previous desk lamp for years has a much warmer light, so it will take some time getting used to this cool bright white lighting. So many pluses, but one small feature that it doesn't have - The arm swings up and down and towards and away, but the lamp head itself does not tilt towards or away which would be a great feature for me. Other than that, I highly recommend it and it's very reasonable for what is does
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: It Doesn't Last -- Less Than 2 Years, Dead
customer_reviews.text: This was a great lamp -- while it lasted. I should consider myself lucky: I got almost two years out of it, much better than other one-star reviews. But I expect more, especially when I am led to believe it will last over 20 years. Here's the what the manufacturer marketing text says: "Longevity & Energy Saving - 50000 hours lifespan, no bulb changing troubles in the next 25 years." After reading that, wouldn't you expect your lamp to last somewhere in the 20-year range? I did. Phiver, you duped me once with your cheap (but great while it lasted) task lamp. You won't dupe me again. Buying something else this time. Won't touch of any of your products.
customer_reviews.author: 2Gr8Girls

customer_reviews.title: easy to position, but light is weak
customer_reviews.text: i don't know why, but all the LED lamps i've gotten are just not that good compared to traditional bulbs. even at max brightness, this lamp sucks for doing any fine work at my desk. the light isn't focused in any way so it spreads out, the bar of LEDS is super annoying and annoying to position to avoid it shining straight into your eyes. entire construction is plastic as well, so it's slowly deforming and the head of the lamp has a huge tilt downwards after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Collins

customer_reviews.title: Not as versatile as promised
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is easy to use . The two-step turn on isn't bad, Both steps are exceptionally easy. It;s very substantial and once installed quite stable. The one drawback is that it does not have the universal freedom-of-motion that is implied in the description. You can usually find a way to get to the position you want but it isn't as simple as just attaching the base and swinging the light to any position you want.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Dunipace

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The lamp seems well made and looks sleek. My computer desk is a 3-foot wide door propped on legs. The lamp clips to the back edge and reaches over my computer monitor or beside it and can be quickly and effortlessly be aimed almost anywhere. Light can be bounced off the ceiling, directed at the copy stand beside my computer or at the keyboard on a shelf that slide from beneath the door. Having LEDs built in instead of adding bulbs makes the light slim and light and much easier to position than any light I've ever owned. My only wish would be a switch to change to warm light. The light is VERY WHITE.
customer_reviews.author: E. Roth

customer_reviews.title: A great item for artists!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very lightweight light that creates almost a daylight effect over your work area. I clamped mine to the back of my desk and it hangs over my drawing board and laptop. There is a button on the top of the light that enables you to adjust the brightness, also the neck and actual light can bend in many directions to accomnodate the space in which you are working. I found this to be very sturdy, as I am always moving it around depending on what I am doing. Best part of it all is that it takes up very little room once it clamped in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Long

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and the desk clamp is much better than your ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my desk lamp, and I am very impressed with it so far. Gives off much more light than I had thought it would at it's brightest setting. Very well made, sturdy and the desk clamp is much better than your average clamps you get with most desk lights. I will be using this in combination with a magnified led lamp for drawing. More than enough light by itself though.
customer_reviews.author: rafael murillo

customer_reviews.title: Best desk lamp out there
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin? I have been searching high and low for a low profile desk lamp and found it with this product. I was able to fix the clamp to the back of the desk and adjust the arms and light to shine directly over my workspace. This is great when working in low light situations. The ability to adjust the brightness of the light is awesome. You simply place your finger on the power switch and it begins to dim or brighten. Amazing! If you are looking for a lamp that brightens things up without taking up a lot of space, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: ABaxter

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, mostly functional, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, this product should have a swiveling head to reach its full potential. The lack of swiveling head and the cheap base (flat non-clamping base is $30 extra) reduces the rating a lot. There are a ton of $30 lamps with different warmth (color) options and tilting heads and have chargers in the base for 1/2 the price, but obviously they are not as tall. The materials feel cheap and it seems like they spent as much on packaging as they did on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: I love it great light
customer_reviews.text: I just set this up literally in 5 minutes! It’s perfect for my desk! I also have a chaise next to my desk if I sit there to read I can swivel the light to the other side easily as long as it’s not desk mounted too close to the wall... I left 6 inches from the wall. At the angle pictured it’s 27 inches tall. The widest part of the base is 2 1/4 inches wide. The light is nice not too bright but a soft bright and it’s dimmable! It came in this nice box very well packaged so if it’s a gift you don’t need to worry about it looking cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J

customer_reviews.title: Great, until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in April 2017 and it burned out with lite home office use by the end of 2017. I just sent an email to the vendor requesting warranty repairs and am waiting to hear back. Addendum: the vendor sent me a new one which is working fine. Hence the change from one to five stars
customer_reviews.author: C. James

customer_reviews.title: Lamp flickering!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I need a good desk-lamp for studying. I read many reviews that put this lamp above all others in terms of functionality and quality. This flickering It comes at intervals of about 10-20 seconds. I can see its light kind of fade away and then back again, and like that, to the point that I have to turn it off because I cannot focus with such thing happening every now and then. Update 11/18/19: It's got much worse to the point that it has become impossible to work with this lamp. Next time I will purchase a different lamp product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Nice even light but screws are too tight
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: to avoid damaging the frame, it is a good idea to loosen the hex screws at the joints and tighten them back up just enough to allow movement. Mine was waaay too tight and it was really twisting the frame when I tried to adjust it to a different position. This is a very lightweight fixture, so the screws don't need tot be that tight. The good news; Unlike many other led lights, this one has nice even light; meaning you can't see the individual LEDs through the diffusion shield. It is a solidly built, high quality lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for its sleek, modern design and good reviews. I was very pleased. After 360 days of use, it went dim -- even unable to read with. I contacted the company, Phive, and determined that there was a short at the switch. They shipped out a new lamp -- with 2 day express shipping -- at no charge and no hassle. A good product with even better customer service. This is the kind of company you want to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: P. Steelquist

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 9 moths - NO WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: Very good short term lamp. Went out after 9 months & blew house circuit breakers. Can not get warranty info - Link goes nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: BundlerBob

customer_reviews.title: Clear, bright light.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp on my desk. The light is bright and clear and makes desk work easier and enjoyable. It attached securely and easily to the desktop edge. It tips up easily so I can access equipment behind it, then returns securely to my preferred position. It turns on or off with a gentle swipe of my finger over the switch. The only thing that would improve it is if it would swivel from side to side so the direction of the light could be changed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but very bright... be careful about your setting.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking lamp. It was a bit more expensive than the other non articulated ones you can find but you can tell that it was better finished. I had to return in in the end as the lamp is way to bright. Due to my monitor position I needed to have it slightly above my eyesight and the claim that the light is filtered by their plastic insert is border line as it will bother you. I thought that the top lamp would rotate so that I could have it face the wall away from my eyes but it does not.
customer_reviews.author: calvin_XL

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but a little too pricey
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the materials used is lower than what I would expect for the price. The description says it's easy to use with various settings, etc but it ISN'T. The arm movement isn't fluid and can actually be difficult to adjust at times. The light source is great. The dimming function is also very convenient but again, not intuitive or easy to adjust or program. Overall I'd say I'm satisfied but not sure I would buy it again. Shop around.
customer_reviews.author: KRK

customer_reviews.title: Good product fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: It was what I expected but I had bought a different one and it was more flexible and more positions that I liked better. It's a good light though and it dims which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Loved It......for a very few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this lamp, looked good, extended above my work area nicely and provided good light. After a couple of weeks of use I noticed a flicker every now and then but no big deal until day 27, today, when it started flickering like a strobe light and then died completely. NOW I notice some reviews mentioning similar experiences. Someday I'll learn to read the bad reviews first and discount the rest. Nice design for a lamp but all for not due to the junk circuitry.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous light & Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This architecture light is wonderful: it has a very streamlined and attractive design, a bright and warm light, and is easily adjustable. We liked it so much we bought it for all of our desks and use them on a daily basis. There is also a nice touch button off/on switch, which is a nice touch. Imagine, then, my sorrow when the light all of a sudden stopped working. I contacted Phive's customer service and they responded within 24 hours. When it was clear that something had gone wrong with the light, they immediately sent a replacement! I love the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for about 5 weeks now. It seems well made, is quite stylish and gives off a lot more light (much brighter) than another larger (non LED) architects style lamp that I have. The reach could be a bit better, but it's not bad for quite a small lamp. On the downside, I did notice that when you switch it on, it can interfere with radio signals, but you can usually mitigate it by moving your radio to another location.
customer_reviews.author: PAR

customer_reviews.title: When it failed, got a new one fast
customer_reviews.text: Desk lamp after 8 months it failed. Phive sent a new one quickly. Yes, I got a different color than the original and I could have sent it back for the original silver color, but black will work well too! PROS: the dimming feature is a big plus. Very stylish look. The arm and lamp design work very well. Glad I bought this lamp. So good, I bought one for a friend who sells gems. The ultra white color works perfectly with gemstones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Steel

customer_reviews.title: Terrific purchase and a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this light is first class, including the packaging. What a great experience to open the package and see the attention and care put into details like packing materials and graphics. The light itself is made well and works wonderfully. It's very bright and the clamp that holds it to the side of my drawing table is overly built and sturdy. Seriously, this product gets my highest recommendation. It's worth more than the $55 I paid. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cary C. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and sleek multi-purpose light
customer_reviews.text: I run pop-up jewelry trunk shows in shopping malls during Xmas season. One of the locations is an outdoor mall, and it gets dark in the afternoons. I bought 2 of these to attach to my table (on my side of the table) to light up the jewelry products (from the customer side). It worked very well in terms of brightness, color, and ease of use. The only thing that would have made it even better is a couple more inches more on the arm. Unfortunately, this review will not let me attach a photo.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. I needed a light that would reach over my huge monitor to brighten up my desk space. This is tall enough to go over the monitor, but provides enough light for my desk. It's also thin enough that it doesn't block the view. I bought the base with it, but I don't think I will use it - it clamped so well to my desk and that makes it take up less space.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Dead after a few days
customer_reviews.text: While I did like the light output from this product it died after only a few days of using it. It arrived requiring assembly including one of the friction joints, but there was no documentation at all in the box. No instructions for assembly. Not a big deal for me but would be for some. The light would also creep out of position once adjusted. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: W Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for home office or as a task light for crafts.
customer_reviews.text: This light is well made and will get very bright when at it's brightest. The brightness is easy to adjust - hold your finger on the On/Off button and it will increase to its max, then decrease to off - just stop when you're happy. I use in my home office just above the top of my computer monitor and directly overtop my keyboard. Size-wise, it's very unobtrusive and adjustable. I also like that the light is pretty focused downward and not out around the room, and is a pure LED white. It would make a great task light for crafts or for a composer writing sheet music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, with wonderful light and function.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made lamp and perfect for desk or bench work. It articulates well in any direction and provides a bright white light. The ability to dim this to suit is a nice touch. The lamp feels solid and long-lasting; and it looks sleek and modern. I was so impressed with the lamp I immediately bought 2 more — one for my wife's desk, and another for my drafting table. At this price this is excellent value for money. You will not be disappointed in this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: R. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust light level, angle, and placement.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these now. It is a well made lamp, easy to adjust, and the light level is scalable by holding the power button. It's amazing how useful it is to have the light level you actually want, depending on the time of day and the type of thing you are doing. My daughter uses one for homework, drawing, reading, and science experiments (see, versatile). I use mine at the computer desk to add light if I am reading or working on anything that is not on the monitor. I'll probably end up with these in the garage and other places.
customer_reviews.author: Rab Beverly

customer_reviews.title: My Wonderful Phive
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review with the aid of my "Wonderful Phive Lite" With out it I would not be writing it at all. Where I have my computer the lighting is poor and I am not a typist. That last statement us for sure an understatement to say the least. I have struggled to see my keyboard for a long time but now with the aid of my Phive lite I have no problems seeing it at all. The lite was easy to install and it does everything that I had hoped that it would. I only wish that I would have had it a long time ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Lamp started to flicker
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lamp for 10 months and up to now I was very happy with it. It started to flicker today and it will not come on. I read other reviews and this seems to be a common problem mentioned in 17 other reviews. It had so many good reviews that I bought it with the optional desk stand but now I have a useless lamp!
customer_reviews.author: The Occasional Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Architect style desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for - an architect lamp that would clamp to my desk and not utilize desk space. Provides enough lumens that I don’t need other lights in the room when working at my desk. Also has a dimming feature which is a nice to have but which I will probably not use. Looks a bit on the flimsy side but I can live with that when I saved $150 over a comparable light at Room and Board.
customer_reviews.author: Gen 3+

customer_reviews.title: looks great !
customer_reviews.text: sleek contemporary design. quality feel and look. shopped it well and this was the best value and quality amazon offered. very few in this silver finish which also is a plus if you have silver finishes thruout your home. bright lite or low lite at tap of your finger. make sure you measure carefully the are you want it to reach over and illuminate to be sure this one is for you. clamps down just like described and according to measurements provided. would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: abdo habbouche

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but bad on/off functionality
customer_reviews.text: The white switch (see attached pic) only works to turn the lamp off, not on. To turn the lamp on, one can only tap the on/off button on the very top of the lamp. That is inconvenient. I would much rather turn the lamp on and off through the white switch, which I have attached to my desk but is virtually worthless since it can't be used to turn the lamp on. Why not also allow the lamp to be turned on through the switch?
customer_reviews.author: NIO

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light for my sewing room. I was not sure whether to purchase an expensive one or a more reasonably priced light. I chose the Phive light, the cheaper of the two, and I am thrilled with it. It is easy to use and move around as needed on its swiveling arm.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp!
customer_reviews.text: For years, I struggled with desk lamps that over time sank their little heads onto my work space, and I could find no way to resusitate them. Then I looked into new lighting and found this baby, and it is fantastic. I love the sleek look of it, the ease with which it turns on, moves side to side and that it was easy to attach it to my work bench. I just might have to get a couple more, as I have some more desk lamps ready to give up the ghost.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lamp that's bright and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp. Bright...daylight temperature nearly matches my other lights. Very easy to assemble and mount. However the light control is hard to use accurately because the brightness control button is very small. You hold it to vary the brightness. There is no way to accurately adjust to a specific brightness repeatedly...an actual slider that moves along a marked scale would be better. Also, the color temperature is reduced when you reduce the brightness...so the illumination warms up in tone as the brighness decreases. That's not necessarily a bad thing...it's just a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, aren't we all.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to light my keyboard and work surface. It is an very nice lamp, well packaged, easy to install, and worked right out of the box. However, It would be perfect if the head rotated. Normally the head is just above my monitors (20" off the table top) so there is a constant light bar just above my line of sight. I think I can fix this with a little cardboard and duct tape but I hate to wreck an otherwise nice design. But you have to do what you have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: After lots of looking, this was the right lamp for me.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I use it on my desk as an extra source of light when working on projects with small things. But this desk is also my main home office desk, so I can fold the light up and out of the when when I'm just doing regular computer work. The maneuverability of the arms are good. The only movement I wish it could do is rotate (or roll) the top light bar so the light isn't pointed straight down, but rather 15-degrees away from my eyes. Not to bad because there are many other joints that I can still position the light specifically for whichever project I'm working on.
customer_reviews.author: John S6r

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sewing room
customer_reviews.text: Love this light! It's perfect to transition from my sewing desk to the cutting table. It's very well made and produces a lot of light without producing glare. Update to the previous review (above) originally purchased and written about six months ago. I rearranged my sewing room and like this light so much I bought a second one. Now I have one specifically for my cutting table and another specifically over my sewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Diannelm

customer_reviews.title: Near Perfect Articulated LED Desk Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was BRIGHT! The lamp is super thin yet LED, with brilliant output which can be dimmed at the mere touch of the finger. The articulated arms are longer than most of this type. They feel study and provide nice extension over a large desk or drawing board. I use mine over my six foot hobby work bench. I've checked out quite a number of these articulated desk lamps and hands down, for me, this is one awesome light. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall S.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this light in the beginning. It’s easy to use, great crisp lighting, bright, sturdy, and easy to manuever. HOWEVER, it just kinda gave out on me today. So just 8 months in and I’m out the $60 I paid for it. Not sure what’s happening, the lightbulb is just suddenly dim after using it for a few minutes at a time a couple times a week over the last 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great style, functionality and great light
customer_reviews.text: I have had many studio table lights in the last 40 years and this by far is the most functional and best looking. The ability to have adjustable light intensity, clean white light is perfect for my architectural studio. I bought one for my 85 year young Dad our Senior Architect and he loves it as well. We have always used the fluorescent 2 bulb units in the past which are heavy , flicker and unstable. Great job best improvement in studio lighting in 50 years.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift to my husband. He says ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband. He says it interferes with this radio, which he listens to on earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp I've ever used period! SUPER LAMP!
customer_reviews.text: I work with two extra large monitors and a reflective keyboard. This lights up the entire work area without causing a reflection that makes the keyboard hard to see. Plenty of light but it doesn't hurt my eyes. And the bulb is supposed to last 25 years! SUPER LAMP!
customer_reviews.author: B. Jansson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Needs one other feature
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. The different levels you can set. The ease of turning it on and off is great. The mounting was easy. It pivots 360 degrees and it goes up and down as much as you need. I would just like the ability to rotate the light 180 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: The dimmer switch is a nice feature. I use that all the time
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars if I could. The lamp is way beyond my expectations for a $58 desk lamp. I did also buy the base, which is necessary if you want to fully utilize this lamp. Being able to move the lamp around adds to its value. The dimmer switch is a nice feature. I use that all the time, especially in the morning. Also, this thing can be raised up high if needed, which is why it replaced my old desk architect lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is one cool. Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp! Bought this one to replace an old halogen lamp that when turned on got really hot. This lamp gives plenty of light for my drafting board and is nice and cool. Really like the touch pad/button that turns on/off the light. The dimming feature is a nice touch. Highly recommend this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: P. Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clamp lamp for my loft bed. I first tried using one of those cheap silver lamps which slot into a black plastic mounting piece but it was dangerously wobbly. Ended up splurging on this one because of the sturdy looking mount and the general sleek look. Half a year later, still very satisfied! Looks great, clamps tightly without wiggle, light range goes from bright enough to light up my entire (small) room to dim enough to read late at night. Adjusts and rotates smoothly at a touch without bouncing back to former position. Only quibble is that it gets quite hot if it's left on for a long time (probably unavoidable).
customer_reviews.author: kath

customer_reviews.title: After spending months looking for the perfect lamp, this is by far the best one!
customer_reviews.text: I spent months trying out different lamps and by far this is the best one! As I work on several monitors, glare can be a big problem. However because this lamp can be adjusted in so many different ways, I'm always able to avoid any glare and also prevent the light to be in my eye line which can be distracting. The ability to adjust the dimmer with the slide a finger is incredibly convenient and also being able to adjust the light to 4 different color levels (3200k, 4200k, 5200k, 6200k) is great in setting the tone when working late or starting early. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh M

customer_reviews.title: The search for the best lamp is over...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lamp I ever owned!! You can adjust it to any height and angle and also adjust the brightness and dimness! The lamp stays where you adjust it to too! Very steady and doesn't feel or look cheap. Even the on and off is button is nice it's touch sensitive to how long you hold it or touch it. I use it for crafting. Other lamps are too low or too bright and my hurts end up hurting. This one you can angle it and dim it to your pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Muahz143

customer_reviews.title: within 48hrs customer service contacted me and had new lamp AT MY HOME
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lamp because style and design looked great. The first lamp sent did not work, HOWEVER, I posted a review with 2 stars and explained my apprehension of ordering/replacing the lamp, and within 48hrs customer service contacted me and had new lamp AT MY HOME ( No charges)!!! Great customer service and product replacement. I hope to get an extended period of time with this BRILLIANT (as in bright) lamp. It does do a great job lighting up dark/dim areas in isolated spots.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. Sturdy, bright, and adjustable (height and light level)
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our kid's loft bed desks. They love the adjustable height so they can keep the light on their projects and out of their eyes. Also, if you hold the power button, it dims, which is a convenient feature. Works great. Seems to be sturdy so far, (we have had them for a month) but our kids are fairly careful with their things. Keep in mind, when you install it, that there is both a power button on top of the lamp and a switch on the cord (so you don't think it is broken when really you just didn't know there was a switch on the cord).
customer_reviews.author: Sardifish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small desks, SLEEK!
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this lightweight light. I have a second work desk in my house that I use on occasion and this light is lightweight and does not flip the small desk. Bright ligh and dimmable. It also looks fantastic, very sleek in design. I love it. I do think it's a bit delicate because of it's fineness but I take care with it not to be careless and rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mpotter

customer_reviews.title: Bright light that has decent reach...limited movement
customer_reviews.text: Good light that can attach to any desk. Has a number of configuration options....it would be nice if it was connected to a swivel ball mount at the top. It is limited only at the base moving laterally . Strong light with quick response to on off and dimming capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Light!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a jewelry artist and lighting is critical. I set up a new area in my studio and really didn't want to spend $175 to buy a light like the 3 I had. Plus those expensive lights meant drilling into my work top to mount and they are bulky. This light was $55, came same day free shipping and it is as versatile and bright as the expensive bench lights I have. And no drilling. I had it set up in 5 minutes and it takes up a smaller area. Wish I had found this light before I bought the other ones. I would definitely recommend this light!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stillman

customer_reviews.title: seems well made
customer_reviews.text: so far this lamp meets my expectations. i had trouble turning it on at first and the manufacturer was very quick to reply to my email about this and resolve my problem (it was my problem, nothing wrong with the lamp). it seems well made, I expect it should be durable. i only wish it had one more axis of rotation at the head, I can't quite aim it the way i would like, like the very old luxo that this is replacing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rose

customer_reviews.title: The ability to fad the light up/down is really nice. The light can reach high above my computer ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp on my thin glass top desk and it works perfectly. It moves enough for me to be able to adjust it and turn it on/off with a simple tap. The ability to fad the light up/down is really nice. The light can reach high above my computer monitors but does not swivel as well as expected. Still a great product - had it for 2 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really,really terrific LED lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'd add a photo, but my Home/Office is still in the construction stage. But after carefully reviewing VIRTUALLY EVERY LED desk lamp, I'd decided on the Phive CL-1. While there were other more expensive models from Phive with additional features. Considering my tight budget with this lamps features this fit my needs perfectly. It's so sleek and the light output is amazing. The only change I would have wanted was the desk base but at another $25 bucks I decided to forgo that option.
customer_reviews.author: ezryder1528

customer_reviews.title: Good desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Good desk lamp, a bit wobbly though. The light and other core qualities are decent. However, when I am writing on my desk, the lamp wobbles and it takes a while for it to damp down.
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: LED desk lamp, a solid and bright product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very bright, very well built desk light with a solid clamp. The light does not wiggle and stays in place. The build quality is great, looks and feels sturdy. In the full setting version this desk lamp is too bright but it is dimmable to ones liking. Will buy another one for my work office. The lamp comes in a nice book, very well packaged and protected. My lamp arrived a day earlier. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dr D

customer_reviews.title: which can be good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light to use on a work bench. So far the light has done it's job. The light is very bright. The switch is very sensitive, which can be good and bad. It feels of very good quality. I can not compare it to any others. There are some limitations on what angles you can move it, but that is the design of the light. The head does rotate so it is able to help the limitations of the angles.
customer_reviews.author: Thisguy

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use small profile
customer_reviews.text: This is used in a craft room the ease of mobility ( clamping it at different spots around the desk) and the brightness is just right. Have it for over a month with no issues using a couple of hours a night
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. Very solid build
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. Very solid build. It does not feel cheap or lightweight. The dimming feature is awesome. This light gets very bright, which is a great thing, but just don't need it at 100% all the time. I like that it is instant also. As soon as I touch the power button the LED light is on - no flickering, or warming up as with bulbs or halogens. I am very satisfied with this purchase. I also got the base with it and works great together.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Attached this to my bookcase headboard - WOW what a great light. My cats like to rub their chins on it and it is steady as a rock. I also use it as a night light so that I'm not walking into a dark bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: S L Tate

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy, and unabtrusive
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy. There are so many ways to adjust the light that it would be hard not to find the perfect position. I have mounted duel monitors on my desk and this the light is perfect. The brightness adjustment is so simple, I almost did not know how to do it. Just hold the on / off button, Liked it so much, I purchased a second for the other desk
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Slimline Task Lighting
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase of a swing-arm desk lamp - and this one finally fits all my very specific needs (the other 2 were returned). It's silver (matches both of my Apple computers), it's slim and doesn't block my computer screen view, and is long enough to reach over my 2nd Apple monitor to provide task lighting for my desktop. The lamp securely clamps to the side of the desk and has rubber grips to hold it steady without damaging my desktop. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Stripling

customer_reviews.title: Broke my desk be careful to use it with glass desk
customer_reviews.text: Was pleased with lamp just what I expected, but I gave 3 starts because it broke my glass desk. Be careful when attaching it to glass. Desk was way more expensive than lamp. Wish I could post picture.
customer_reviews.author: tono

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, better than your average lamp.
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty cool while it lasted, although it could be brighter. I had for almost 8 months before the actual lamp part broke off. I’m assuming it started cracking from using it so much because I barely touched it & it crumpled off. Oh and it definitely gets warm, you’ll start to get hot after sitting by it too long.
customer_reviews.author: Greta stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp for any Desk!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my art desk. Easy to set up, it's adjustable and does everything as described. It's LED, so much easier on my eyes. Looks good with my Apple products. I'm spoiled now. The touch feature is great! :)
customer_reviews.author: cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great but light is too blue
customer_reviews.text: I returned the lamp and bought another one for the same price that had a choice of light color. It was not a Phive and is not as functional as the Phive. To get a Phive with colors I'd have to spend another $40. The Phive has a small clamp which helps me position it. The on off is on top of the light, not on the clamp. The range of motion is great.
customer_reviews.author: Irvin Paik

customer_reviews.title: quite stylish desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: very nice light. Im not a big fan of the touch sensitive button on the top. Would prefer either no button there, as it has a real physical switch near the base, or a physical button on the lamp. My goal was to have them controlled by alexa and with the touch sensitive button when the power goes off it doesnt remember if it was on or off when it comes back on. Which means alexa can never turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: steve heistand

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend to all artists and crafters
customer_reviews.text: As an artist, I was looking for a lamp that would provide bright WHITE daytime light over a broad area and I certainly found it in this lamp. I can move the lamp in whatever position I need and it stays put! No sagging or wobbling at all. I would definitely recommend to all artists and crafters.
customer_reviews.author: That One Girl

customer_reviews.title: I thought I had reviewed this lamp ages ago. ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had reviewed this lamp ages ago. It is exactly what I have been dreaming of as an art table lamp for years. Lumens as bright as the sun... dimmer that is one touch brighter or dimmer and on/off. If you need a an art or craft lamp look no further. BTW it was $100 cheaper than the next choice model I had been considering so the price was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Roundtree

customer_reviews.title: Great desk light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as she enjoys drawing on her desk. It provides excellent light. It was worth the uptick in price as I wanted a long, adjustable bar light. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Studio light
customer_reviews.text: I installed this light in my studio and I absolutely love it. a simple passing touch turns the light on and off. I cannot love this light enough. As my business expands, I will be ordering more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Poetivity

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this light and was disappointed that it stopped working after just 4 months of use. The power supply is outputting the 12V so that still works but it seems the touch sensitive button that turns on or off the light as well as dims it doesn't work anymore. Emailed the company at there service@phive.com and have not heard a response. I feel at this price it should last more than a few years let alone a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jacamo

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and brighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Good, much brighter than I expected, but little glare on the work surface. I used it to replace a lamp taking up space on my desk and am very happy with the design; I can move it closer if I need good lighting on a project or push it back out of the way for computer work. It's not quite bright enough to balance the sunlight coming through a window on one side of my desk during video conferences, but it helps. I'm getting another type of light for that.
customer_reviews.author: MikeD

customer_reviews.title: Bright, flexible, light weight, efficient, stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home office. I tend to leave my desk light on all day so I was looking for a LED lamp solution. The arm is flexible enough so I can illuminate the surface under my monitors without creating a glare on the monitor. This lamp is perfect because it met all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuyinQueensNY

customer_reviews.title: Modern design, good build quality.
customer_reviews.text: If I have one complaint, it should have a third axis of tilt on the head. It has x and y but no z. Besides that, the fit and finish is good. It has a nice, smooth finish and the quality of build is clean. No burrs, sharp edges or loose joints. Very happy overall with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JOBY

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid!
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this a 5/5. Maybe my thoughts will change. But, for now, I'm sticking with 4. Pros: The silver is slick looking. The hardware is easy to manipulate. It does like my whole (small) room pretty well Cons: While the hardware is easy to manipulate, I don't feel like it articulates in the right spots. Also, some of the pieces are arranged such that no matter how I position the LEDs, they are getting hit directly with the light- my eyes are extremely sensitive to it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin  Klyczek

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great service
customer_reviews.text: I've had my CL-1 for 3 years now and loved it. It just stopped working a few days ago and I reached out to their service. They are sending a replacement and I can't wait to see my desk again!
customer_reviews.author: zaxv14

customer_reviews.title: It can expand to 34" high.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this lamp so that I would have more light at my Sewing station. I love it. When I need to cut something out I go to the kitchen table but the lighting in the kitchen is not very good .I can attach this to the tables edge and it lights up the whole table .Then when I'm through I can move it back to my sewing area.
customer_reviews.author: leslie skrivanek

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light and Fully Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The light was very bright with multiple settings to suit the surface conditions. But the light dimming switch could be improved. It only had three settings instead of a full light adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Ozamandiz

customer_reviews.title: Stellar
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and mounted them on a fairly large (4x5) hobby desk. Used strictly for scale modeling. The light is bright and clear, making detailed model projects easier. Quality of hardware appears and feels modern/well-built. Swivels and tilts more than enough for my needs. Recommended without reserve.
customer_reviews.author: howesteel

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 year in and not bright anymore
customer_reviews.text: I search for a way to contact the seller to ask if there's a way to fix the fading light after just 1 year of use. There is no replacement bulb supposed to last 25 years. I'm an architecture student who is has to work in a basement and booo my light source is not good enough for drafting right now. I'll continue to try to contact them and update this review.
customer_reviews.author: S. Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 of them, very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Using for company order filling work space. I set up tonight and very happy with quality, style and price. Glad I didn't go cheap but they weren't prohibitively expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best Craft light ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest light to install and it produces a substantial amount of light. It is perfect for close work and I just love it. It was a great solution.
customer_reviews.author: Phionna

customer_reviews.title: and the included mount makes it quite sturdy. The lamp stays exactly where you put it
customer_reviews.text: This lamp provides bright, clean light, and the included mount makes it quite sturdy. The lamp stays exactly where you put it, even after I modified it to attach a GoPro Session on the very end of the boom -- very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: lazd

product_meta.title: Phive CL-1 LED Architect Desk Lamp/Clamp Lamp, Metal Swing Arm Dimmable Task Lamp (Touch Control, Eye-Care Technology, Memory Function, Highly Adjustable Office/Work Light) Silver
feature_bullets: Protect Eyes - Close to daylight illumination, diffusion panel emitting soft light without ghost, glare or flicker.
Stepless Dimming - Memory of brightness, free to adjust and easy to keep personal setting.
Highly Adjustable - 180°swivel lamp head,16.3+16.3 inches adjustable metal arm, rotatable body. Strong clamp supports up to 2.36 inches tabletop.
Longevity & Energy Saving - 50000 hours lifespan, no bulb changing troubles in the next 25 years. 20% energy consumption as a incandescent bulb does.
What you get - 1 x Desk Lamp, 1 x Metal Clamp (up to 2.36inch), 1 x Arm Adjust Tools,1 x User Manual,1 x Power Adapter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars748 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
